attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/exquisite-sword-mastery.png} tip={Exquisite Sword Mastery (4th Job)} val={+70%}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training (2nd Job)} val={+60}> <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/anima-warrior.png} tip={Anima Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15% to assigned AP}>

attackStats.name: Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/exclusive-spell.png} tip={Exclusive Spell (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-verse.png} tip={Serene Verse (1st Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/sword-mastery.png} tip={Sword Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/exquisite-sword-mastery.png} tip={Exquisite Sword Mastery (4th Job)} val={+48}> <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-verse-iv.png} tip={Serene Verse IV (4th Job)} val={+57}>

attackStats.name: Crit Rate
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-verse.png} tip={Serene Verse (1st Job)} val={+15%}> <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-verse-ii.png} tip={Serene Verse II (2nd Job)} val={+20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-verse-iii.png} tip={Serene Verse III (3rd Job)} val={+10%}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/eyes-unclouded.png} tip={Eyes Unclouded (4th Job)} val={+15%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/grandis-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Grandis Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+40%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/impenetrable-skin.png} tip={Impenetrable Skin (5th Job)} val={+6% when hit up to +30%}>

attackStats.name: Final Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-verse.png} tip={Serene Verse (1st Job)} val={+5%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-verse-ii.png} tip={Serene Verse II (2nd Job)} val={+10%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-verse-iii.png} tip={Serene Verse III (3rd Job)} val={+10%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/exquisite-sword-mastery.png} tip={Exquisite Sword Mastery (4th Job)} val={+9%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-verse-iv.png} tip={Serene Verse IV (4th Job)} val={+20%}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/weapon-aura.png} tip={Weapon Aura (5th Job)} val={+6%}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/grandis-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Grandis Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+15% to certain skills (refer to skill)}>

buffInfo.summons: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/riotous-heart.png} tip={Third Plum Blossom Sword: Riotous Heart (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/hearts-united.png} tip={Third Plum Blossom Sword: Hearts United (4th Job)}>(10s recharge / 30s cd) <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/thousand-blossom-flurry.png} tip={Final Plum Blossom Sword: Thousand Blossom Flurry (5th Job)} dur={[Up to 30s](120s cd)}>
buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/sublimation.png} tip={Sublimation (Hyper Skill)} dur={[15s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/thousand-blossom-flurry.png} tip={Final Plum Blossom Sword: Thousand Blossom Flurry (5th Job)} dur={[30s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/soul-immeasurable.png} tip={Soul Immeasurable (5th Job)} dur={[20s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/grandis-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Grandis Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[40s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/weapon-aura.png} tip={Weapon Aura (5th Job)} dur={[94s](120s recharge, up to 2 charges)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/impenetrable-skin.png} tip={Impenetrable Skin (5th Job)} dur={[18s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/exclusive-spell.png} tip={Exclusive Spell (Beginner Skill)} dur={[2400s](300s cd)}>
buffInfo.binds: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/plum-branch-snare.png} tip={Fifth Plum Blossom Sword: Plum Branch Snare (Hyper Skill)} dur={[10s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/divided-heavens.png} tip={Rising Azure Dragon: Divided Heavens (6th Job)} dur={[10s](360s cd)}>

buffInfo.damageReduce: <tt src={/class-icons/link-skills/grounded-body.png} tip={Grounded Body (Link Skill)} dur={(-6%)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/dancing-annihilation.png} tip={Final Plum Blossom Sword: Dancing Annihilation (5th Job)} dur={[Up to 5s](-50% | 120s cd)}>

linkSkill.name: Grounded Body
linkSkill.shortDesc: Damage: -6%, including attacks that inflict damage at a certain percentage of your Max HP

build: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-breeze.png} tip={Serene Breeze}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/free-spirit.png} tip={Free Spirit}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-verse.png} tip={Serene Verse}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/slice.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword: Slice}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/lilting-petal.png} tip={Lilting Petal}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/sword-mastery.png} tip={Sword Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/blossoming-blade.png} tip={Blossoming Blade}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-verse-ii.png} tip={Serene Verse II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/spirit-strike.png} tip={Imugi Spirit Sword: Spirit Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/strike.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword: Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/petal-flash-1.png} tip={First Plum Blossom Sword: Petal Flash}>

<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-verse-iii.png} tip={Serene Verse III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/ironbark-body.png} tip={Ironbark Body}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/spirit-strike-ii.png} tip={Imugi Spirit Sword: Spirit Strike II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/raining-blossoms.png} tip={Second Plum Blossom Sword: Raining Blossoms}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serpents-blessing.png} tip={First Imugi Spirit Sword: Serpent's Blessing}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/burrowing-earth.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Burrowing Earth}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/slash.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword: Slash}>

<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-verse-iv.png} tip={Serene Verse IV}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/eyes-unclouded.png} tip={Eyes Unclouded}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/exquisite-sword-mastery.png} tip={Exquisite Sword Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/anima-warrior.png} tip={Anima Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/storm.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword: Storm}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serpents-fang.png} tip={Second Imugi Spirit Sword: Serpent's Fang}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/spirit-strike-iii.png} tip={Imugi Spirit Sword: Spirit Strike III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/ravenous-spirit.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Ravenous Spirit}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/riotous-heart.png} tip={Third Plum Blossom Sword: Riotous Heart}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/unbowed-blade.png} tip={Fourth Plum Blossom Sword: Unbowed Blade}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/anima-heros-will.png} tip={Anima Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/spirit-strike-reinforce.png} tip={Spirit Strike - Reinforce}> Spirit Strike - Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/storm-reinforce.png} tip={Storm - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/storm-boss-rush.png} tip={Storm - Boss Rush}> Storm - Reinforce and Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/wish-unending-reinforce.png} tip={Wish Unending - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/wish-unending-guardbreak.png} tip={Wish Unending - Ignore Guard}> Wish Unending - Reinforce and Guardbreak_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/spirit-strike.png} tip={Imugi Spirit Sword: Spirit Strike (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/raining-blossoms.png} tip={Second Plum Blossom Sword: Raining Blossoms (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/burrowing-earth.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Burrowing Earth / Ravenous Spirit / Years Uncounteds (3rd Job / 4th Job / Hyper Skill)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/storm.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword: Storm (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/riotous-heart.png} tip={Third Plum Blossom Sword: Riotous Heart (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serpents-fang.png} tip={Second Imugi Spirit Sword: Serpent's Fang / Fourth Plum Blossom Sword: Unbowed Blade (4th Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/slice.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword: Slice (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/strike.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword: Strike (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/spirit-strike.png} tip={Imugi Spirit Sword: Spirit Strike (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/slash.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword: Slash (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/raining-blossoms.png} tip={Second Plum Blossom Sword: Raining Blossoms (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/burrowing-earth.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Burrowing Earth / Ravenous Spirit / Years Uncounteds (3rd Job / 4th Job / Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/storm.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword: Storm (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/riotous-heart.png} tip={Third Plum Blossom Sword: Riotous Heart (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serpents-fang.png} tip={Second Imugi Spirit Sword: Serpent's Fang / Fourth Plum Blossom Sword: Unbowed Blade (4th Job)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to the members of the Ren Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build

extraContent.title: Final Imugi Spirit Sword Skills
content: In 3rd Job, Ren unlocks access to [Final Imugi Spirit Sword] skills that can be activated using <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/wish-unending.png} tip={Wish Unending (3rd Job)}> Wish Unending. These skills cannot be used on their own and can only be activated by repeatedly pressing or holding the Skill Key <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/wish-unending.png} tip={Wish Unending (3rd Job)}> to cycle through each skill
Below is a list of all Final Imugi Spirit Sword skills:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/burrowing-earth.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Burrowing Earth (3rd Job)}> Burrowing Earth (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/ravenous-spirit.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Ravenous Spirit (4th Job)}> Ravenous Spirit (4th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/years-uncounted.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Years Uncounted (Hyper Skill)}> Years Uncounted (Hyper Skill)_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/blade-of-the-unbound-heart.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Blade of the Unbound Heart (5th Job)}> Blade of the Unbound Heart (5th Job)_>
When unlocked, the skills are also used in the same order

primary.name: Return
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Moves you to Serpent's Heartwater.\nCooldown: 600 sec.
details: This skill is obtained from the Ren storyline

primary.name: Shapeshift
primary.shortDesc: Hide your ears and shows a head decoration. Use the skill again to hide both your ears and head decoration\nCooldown: 2 sec.
details: This skill is obtained from the Ren storyline

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Duration: 2400 sec., Attack Power & Magic ATT: +4%\nCooldown: 300 sec.
details: To obtain this skill, complete Ren's storyline
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Spirit Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Summon Duration +10%

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword: Slice
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Slash forward

primary.name: Serene Breeze
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Allows you to jump a greater distance.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>

primary.name: Lilting Petal
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, jumps a certain distance\nWhile holding down the key ater skill use, Float Duration: 1 sec., Cooldown: 5 sec.\n[Passive Effect: Knockback Resistance: +40%]
primary.desc: Leap upwards
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Knockback Resistance
Can be used on the ground or in the air
After using, holding the Skill Key will allow you to hop in the air several times<bp_You can move while hopping_>

primary.name: Free Spirit
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +20, Max Speed: +20, Jump: +20

primary.name: Serene Verse
primary.shortDesc: Attack: +30, Critical Rate: +15%, Final Damage: +5%\nDamage Taken: -20%

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword: Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 263%, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Stab forward

primary.name: First Plum Blossom Sword: Petal Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Unsheathes your sword and teleports forward. Use the skill again to sheath your sword and teleport backwards.\n[Passive Effect - Max HP: +10%]
primary.desc: When used, draw or sheath your sword and teleport
details: Using <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/petal-flash-1.png} tip={First Plum Blossom Sword: Petal Flash (2nd Job)}> when the sword is:<bp_[Drawn] <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/petal-flash-2.png} tip={First Plum Blossom Sword: Petal Flash - Draw (2nd Job)}>: Teleport forwards_[Sheathed] <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/petal-flash-3.png} tip={First Plum Blossom Sword: Petal Flash - Sheath (2nd Job)}>: Teleport backwards_The sword will remain drawn or sheathed until the skill is used again_>

Alternatively, each skill has a separate Key Slot <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/petal-flash-2.png} tip={First Plum Blossom Sword: Petal Flash - Draw (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/petal-flash-3.png} tip={First Plum Blossom Sword: Petal Flash - Sheath (2nd Job)}> to perform each action but can only be used based on the current sword state
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Max HP

primary.name: First Plum Blossom Sword: Petal Flash - Unsheathe
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Unsheathes and teleports you forwards
primary.desc: Unsheathe your sword and teleport forwards
details: Can only be used when the sword is sheathed
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/petal-flash-1.png} tip={First Plum Blossom Sword: Petal Flash (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: First Plum Blossom Sword: Petal Flash - Sheathe
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Sheathes your sword and teleports you backwards
primary.desc: Sheath your sword and teleport backwards
details: Can only be used when the sword is drawn
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/petal-flash-1.png} tip={First Plum Blossom Sword: Petal Flash (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: Blossoming Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration: 200 sec., Sword Attack Speed: +2

primary.name: Imugi Spirit Sword: Spirit Strike
primary.shortDesc: 35% chance to activate at an enemy's location when they are hit by Dancing Annihilation or a founding Plum Blossom Sword technique. Will activate at your location if the enemy has already been defeated.\nMax Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Successful attacks from Plum Blossom Sword skills or <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/dancing-annihilation.png} tip={Final Plum Blossom Sword: Dancing Annihilation (5th Job)}> have a chance to deal an additional slash attack
details: Attack will trigger at your location if the enemy is already defeated
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Sword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Sword Mastery: +50%, Attack: +30

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: STR: +60

primary.name: Serene Verse II
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +20%, Final Damage: +10%

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword: Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 408%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Brandish forward

primary.name: Second Plum Blossom Sword: Raining Blossoms
primary.shortDesc: 35% chance to activate when a direct skill attack lands.\nSummons 5 petals, which deal 120% damage 3 times. Normal Enemy Damage: +120% (additive)
primary.desc: Successful direct skill attacks have a chance to create petals that seek out enemies
details: Deals increased %Damage by a flat amount to regular monsters
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Imugi Spirit Sword: Spirit Strike II
primary.shortDesc: 35% chance to activate at an enemy's location when they are hit by Dancing Annihilation or a founding Plum Blossom Sword technique. Will activate at your location if the enemy has already been defeated.\nMax Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 4
details: Increases %Damage of attack

primary.name: First Imugi Spirit Sword: Serpent's Blessing
primary.shortDesc: 35% chance to recover 2.2% Max HP and activate buff when a skill attack lands.\nBuff Duration: 4 sec., Status Resistance (With Buff): +100\nCooldown: 6 sec.
primary.desc: Grants successful direct attacks a chance to restore %Max HP and gain a buff that increases Status Resistance
details: Unaffected by cooldown reduction

primary.name: Wish Unending
primary.shortDesc: Press the skill key to unleash the Final Imugi Spirit Sword techniques you've learned. Duration: 15 sec. for each Final Imugi Spirit Sword technique.\nThe Final Imugi Spirit Sword techniques are unleashed in the following order: Burrowing Earth, Ravenous Spirit, Years Uncounted, and Blade of the Unbound Heart.\nCooldown: 20 sec.
primary.desc: Press the Skill Key repeatedly to unleash each learned Final Imugi Spirit Sword attack
details: The attacks are activated in the following order: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/burrowing-earth.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Burrowing Earth (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/ravenous-spirit.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Ravenous Spirit (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/years-uncounted.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Years Uncounted (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/blade-of-the-unbound-heart.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Blade of the Unbound Heart (5th Job)}>
Cooldown starts upon first using the skill and is displayed as an outline on the Skill Key
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Burrowing Earth
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40\nUnleashes a forward strike, dealing 550% damage to up to 10 enemies 5 times. Then the earth shatters, dealing 689% damage to up to 10 enemies 7 times.
primary.desc: Slash around and unleash a shockwave forward
details: Skill is activated by using <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/wish-unending.png} tip={Wish Unending (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Serene Verse III
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Critical Rate: +10%, Final Damage: +10%

primary.name: Ironbark Body
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +200, Status Resistance: +30, Knockback Resistance: +60%, Damage Taken: -20%, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword: Storm
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 9. Continuously attacks while the skill key is held, dealing 168% damage to up to 8 enemies 5 times
primary.desc: While held, continuously slash forward
details: Can move, jump, and use <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-breeze.png} tip={Serene Breeze (1st Job)}> while attacking

primary.name: Unity
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120\nPress the arrow key to combine some Plum Blossom Sword techniques with the power of the imugi.\nConverts Third Plum Blossom Sword: Riotous Heart to Third  Plum Blossom Sword: Hearts United
primary.desc: Using the Arrow Keys, choose between the two attacks: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/riotous-heart.png} tip={Third Plum Blssom Sword: Riotous Heart (4th Job)}> or <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/hearts-united.png} tip={Third Plum Blssom Sword: Hearts United (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Third Plum Blossom Sword: Riotous Heart
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80. Continuously attacks, dealing 590% damage to up to 6 enemeis 4 times.
Only 1 sphere of power can be summoned at a time. The sphere will form up to 28  times, including when it is first summoned, and it can only attack a single enemy up to 3 times.
Riotous Heart will prepare a sphere of power to be summoned every 10 sec., and can store up to 2 spheres.
When switching between Riotous Heart and Hearts United, the number of spheres stored by Riotous Heart will be reset. Riotous Heart cannot be used while Hearts United is on cooldown.
--------Hearts United--------
MP Cost: 80. Continously attacks, dealing 210% damage to up to 6 enemies 7 times. Only attacks a single enemy up to 20 times.
Cooldown: 30 sec.
primary.desc: The attack has two possible forms chosen using <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/unity.png} tip={Unity (4th Job)}>:
details: [Riotous Heart] <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/riotous-heart.png} tip={Third Plum Blssom Sword: Riotous Heart (4th Job)}>: Summon a sphere that travels back and forward a fixed distance and damages enemies in its path<bp_Travels up to 28 times and a single enemy can only be hit 3 times_>

[Hearts United] <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/hearts-united.png} tip={Third Plum Blssom Sword: Hearts United (4th Job)}>: Summon a sphere that slowly travels forward and damages enemies in its path<bp_A single enemy can only be hit up to 20 times_>
Swapping forms will activate the skill's cooldown or reset the charges held
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and does not trigger <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serpents-blessing.png} tip={First Imugi Spirit Sword: Serpent's Blessing (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Fourth Plum Blossom Sword: Unbowed Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Invincibility Duration: 3 sec.\nMax Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 395%, Number of Attacks: 6\nCooldown: 70 sec.
primary.desc: Slash around and briefly become invincible
details: Unaffected by cooldown resets and <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Imugi Spirit Sword: Spirit Strike III
primary.shortDesc: 35% chance to activate at an enemy's location when they are hit by Dancing Annihilation or a founding Plum Blossom Sword technique. Will activate at your location if the enemy has already been defeated.\nMax Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 743%, Number of Attacks: 4
details: Increases %Damage of attack

primary.name: Second Imugi Spirit Sword: Serpent's Fang
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skill] Additional Attack Chance: 60%, Damage: 209%, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Successful direct attacks have a chance to deal an additional hit
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Ravenous Spirit
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1251%, Number of Attacks: 9
primary.desc: Stab forward, releasing a serpent
details: Skill is activated by using <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/wish-unending.png} tip={Wish Unending (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Anima Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Grandis Goddess appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Anima Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Exquisite Sword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Sword Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +48, Final Damage: +9%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Additionally, grants flat Attack and increases %Final Damage

primary.name: Serene Verse IV
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +57, Final Damage: +20%

primary.name: Eyes Unclouded
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +15%, Critical Damage: +10%, Ignore Defense: +40%

hyperPassive.name: Wish Unending - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/burrowing-earth.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Burrowing Earth (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/ravenous-spirit.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Ravenous Spirit (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/years-uncounted.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Years Uncounted (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/blade-of-the-unbound-heart.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Blade of the Unbound Heart (5th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Wish Unending - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/burrowing-earth.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Burrowing Earth (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/ravenous-spirit.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Ravenous Spirit (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/years-uncounted.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Years Uncounted (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/blade-of-the-unbound-heart.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Blade of the Unbound Heart (5th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Wish Unending - Critical Chance
details: Increases %Crit Rate of <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/burrowing-earth.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Burrowing Earth (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/ravenous-spirit.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Ravenous Spirit (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/years-uncounted.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Years Uncounted (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/blade-of-the-unbound-heart.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Blade of the Unbound Heart (5th Job)}>

hyperActive.name: Fifth Plum Blossom Sword: Plum Branch Snare
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 720%, Number of Attacks: 12\nStun Duration: 10 sec, Stun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Plum Branch Snare.\nCooldown: 120 sec.
details: Unaffected by cooldown resets

hyperActive.name: Sublimation
hyperActive.shortDesc: Duration: 15 sec.\nImmediately resets the cooldown of Wish Unending and your Final Imugi Spirit Sword progress. While the buff is active, Wish Unending can be used 3 times while it is on cooldown.\nCooldown: 120 sec.
hyperActive.desc: When used, resets the cooldown and progression of <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/wish-unending.png} tip={Wish Unending (3rd Job)}>
details: While active, <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/wish-unending.png} tip={Wish Unending (3rd Job)}> can be used up to 3 times during the skill's cooldown

hyperActive.name: Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Years Uncounted
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60\nUnleashes 8 devastating sword slashes, dealing 380% damage to up to 12 enemies 7 times.\nEnemies hit by the attacks are engulfed in flames ignited by Saya's power, which deal 250% damage 3 times for 5 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Slash forward violently and apply a damaging debuff to enemies hit
details: Skill is activated by using <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/wish-unending.png} tip={Wish Unending (3rd Job)}>

fifthMain.name: Final Plum Blossom Sword: Thousand Blossom Flurry
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 30 sec.
A blossom strike occurs each time a direct skill attack lands while the buff is active
Blossom Strike - Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 280%, Number of Attacks: 3, Creates a plum blossom to flower on the plum blossom tree
Hitting enemies with Storm, HEXA Storm, Dancing Annihilation, Riotous Heart, HEXA Riotous Heart, Hearts United, or HEXA Hearts United 3 times will trigger 1 blossom strike
Plum Tree Flowering: When 30, 70, or 125 blossom strikes are triggered, 20, 40, and 65 plum blossoms will be created
Plum Blossoms - Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 3
Cooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Place down a stationary tree and grants a buff where successful direct attacks activate a [Blossom Strike] attack
details: While summoned, the tree will bloom (up to 3 times) when activating a set amount of [Blossom Strike] and creates [Plum Blossoms] that seek out enemies<bp_The tree disappears upon fully blooming but the buff will remain for the set duration_>
Attacks priortize bosses with the highest HP
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Soul Immeasurable
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Duration: 20 sec.
A divine strike occurs each time a direct skill attack lands. When 90 divine strikes have triggered, the divine serpent will appear
Hitting enemies with Storm, HEXA Storm, Dancing Annihilation, Riotous Heart, HEXA Riotous Heart, Hearts United, or HEXA Hearts United 3 times will trigger 1 divine strike
Divine Strike - Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 600%, Number of Attacks: 2
Divine Serpent - Unleashes 9 slashes that deal 1950% damage to up to 15 enemies 12 times
Cooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: While active, successful direct attacks activate a [Divine Strike] attack
details: Upon activating [Divine Strike] a set amount of times, unleashes [Divine Serpent] attack<bp_Every 3 successful hits from the following skills count as 1 activation: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/storm.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword: Storm (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/hexa-storm.png} tip={HEXA Plum Blossom Sword: Storm (6th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/dancing-annihilation.png} tip={Final Plum Blossom Sword: Dancing Annihilation (5th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/riotous-heart.png} tip={Third Plum Blossom Sword: Riotous Heart (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/hexa-riotous-heart.png} tip={HEXA Third Plum Blossom Sword: Riotous Heart (6th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/hearts-united.png} tip={Third Plum Blossom Sword: Hearts United (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/hexa-hearts-united.png} tip={HEXA Third Plum Blossom Sword: Hearts United (6th Job)}>_>
Attacks prioritize bosses with the highest HP
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Final Plum Blossom Sword: Dancing Annihilation
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Max Key-Down Duration: 5 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1050%, Number of Attacks: 6\nDamage taken while the key is held, including attacks that deal damage in proportion to Max HP: -50%\nCooldown: 120 sec.
details: Can move, jump, and use <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serene-breeze.png} tip={Serene Breeze (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/wish-unending.png} tip={Wish Unending (3rd Job)}> while attacking<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/wish-unending.png} tip={Wish Unending (3rd Job)}> will not have a casting or action delay_>
While held, reduces damage taken including %Max HP attacks, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance), and prevents Critical Abnormal Statuses

fifthMain.name: Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Blade of the Unbound Heart
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 120. Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 10
Fires 12 spirit swords that deal 1500% damage 3 times.
Ignore Defense: 20%
Cooldown: 1 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Release a shockwave and create swords that seek out enemies
details: Skill is activated by using <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/wish-unending.png} tip={Wish Unending (3rd Job)}>
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF
Swords created prioritize bosses with the highest HP and are unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/storm.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword: Storm (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Plum Blossom Sword: Storm
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11. Continuously attacks while the skill key is held, dealing 289% damage to up to 8 enemies 5 times
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/spirit-strike.png} tip={Imugi Spirit Sword: Spirit Strike (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/serpents-fang.png} tip={Second Imugi Spirit Sword: Serpent's Fang / Fourth Plum Blossom Sword: Unbowed Blade (4th Job) (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Imugi Spirit Sword: Spirit Strike
masteryCore.shortDesc: 35% chance to activate at an enemy's location when they are hit by Dancing Annihilation or a founding Plum Blossom Sword technique. Will activate at your location if the enemy has already been defeated.\nMax Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1210%, Number of Attacks: 4
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Second Imugi Spirit Sword: Serpent's Fang
masteryCore.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skill] Additional Attack Chance: 62%, Damage: 325%, Number of Attacks: 2
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 3rd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/burrowing-earth.png} tip={Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Burrowing Earth / Ravenous Spirit / Years Uncounted (3rd Job / 4th Job / Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Wish Unending
masteryCore.shortDesc: Unleashes 2 blasts of spiritual power after you land 8 Final Imugi Spirit Sword techniques, dealing 1380% damage to up to 8 enemies 5 times.\nEach blast only attacks a single enemy up to 1 times.\nIgnore Defense: +20%
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Burrowing Earth
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50\nUnleashes a forward strike, dealing 1150% damage to up to 10 enemies 5 times. Then the earth shatters, dealing 1350% damage to up to 10 enemies 7 times.
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Ravenous Spirit
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 2250%, Number of Attacks: 9
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Final Imugi Spirit Sword: Years Uncounted
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70\nUnleashes 8 devastating sword slashes, dealing 610% damage to up to 12 enemies 7 times.\nEnemies hit by the attacks are engulfed in flames ignited by Saya's power, which deal 415% damage 3 times for 5 sec.
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 4th Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/raining-blossoms.png} tip={Second Plum Blossom Sword: Raining Blossoms (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/riotous-heart.png} tip={Third Plum Blossom Sword: Riotous Heart (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Second Plum Blossom Sword: Raining Blossoms
masteryCore.shortDesc: 35% chance to activate when a direct skill attack lands.\nSummons 5 petals, which deal 180% damage 3 times. Normal Enemy Damage: +270% (additive)
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Third Plum Blossom Sword: Riotous Heart
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 90. Continuously attacks, dealing 1020% damage to up to 6 enemeis 4 times.
Only 1 sphere of power can be summoned at a time. The sphere will form up to 28 times, including when it is first summoned, and it can only attack a single enemy up to 3 times.
Riotous Heart will prepare a sphere of power to be summoned every 10 sec., and can store up to 2 spheres.
When switching between Riotous Heart and Hearts United, the number of spheres stored by Riotous Heart will be reset. Riotous Heart cannot be used while Hearts United is on cooldown.
--------Hearts United--------
MP Cost: 90. Continously attacks, dealing 366% damage to up to 6 enemies 7 times. Only attacks a single enemy up to 20 times.
Cooldown: 30 sec.
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

skillCore.name: Rising Azure Dragon: Divided Heavens
skillCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1500, Invincible during casting
The Azure Dragon's power releases 58 shockwaves, dealing 1500% damage to up to 15 enemies 12 times.
Your imbued sword cleaves the world, unleashing 27 strikes that deal 2100% damage to up to 15 enemies 15 times.
Cooldown: 360 sec.

boostCore.name: Blade of the Unbound Heart Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Blade of the Unbound Heart Final Damage: +60%

meta: Ren is a STR warrior class part of the Anima class group. Ren uses Swords as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Ren can equip Imugi Gems
